name: Hindicraft
tag_list: indian-handicrafts, gifts, decorative-items, handmade-flatware, serving-sets, costume-jewelry, handbags, serving-flatware-sets, spreaders-and-serving-sets, flatware-souvenir, baby-flatware-sets
overview:
If you’re looking for kitchen and dining items, we build durable flatware set, serving flatware sets, spreaders and serving sets, flatware souvenir, baby flatware sets and platters that look great, 100% handcrafted, and available in 18/10, 16/10, 14/8 and 14/4 stainless steel with brilliant corrosion resistant finish.

If it’s fashion jewelry you’re after, we create a wide variety of eye-catching and aesthetic fashion and costume jewelry from bone, metal, glass, horn, thread and wood which includes bangles, bracelets, rings, earrings, necklaces, belts, cuffs and a variety of handbags.
